description:
Enjoy this pack featuring a collaboration of Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL and Marvelous's WACCA!

This DLC includes a total of 8 songs, 4 gear skins, 1 note skin, and 1 original theme.

< New Songs >
1. Let you DIVE! - HARDCORE TANO*C & エリザベス(CV:大西沙織)
2. Chariot - USAO
3. ONOMATO Pairing!!! - t+pazolite feat. ななひら
4. with U - t+pazolite & Massive New Krew feat. リリィ(CV:青木志貴)
5. Ouvertüre - USAO & DJ Genki feat. ルーン(CV:河瀬茉希)
6. EPHMR - aran
7. DUAL BREAKER XX - Srav3R vs Getty
8. Invisible Frenzy - Kobaryo

< Gear skin >
1. WACCA S
2. WACCA Lily
3. WACCA Lily R
4. WACCA Reverse

< Note skin >
1. WACCA

< Theme >
"In Memory of WACCA"
- This theme is exclusive to the WACCA pack.
name: Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL X WACCA Collaboration Pack
